name: toggle-case
description: Toggle through various cases on a key press

commands.title: Toggle Case between UPPERCASE and lowercase
Toggle Case between UPPERCASE and lowercase separately for each selection
Toggle Case between UPPERCASE and lowercase and original
Toggle Case among custom case sequence 1
Toggle Case among custom case sequence 2
Toggle Case among custom case sequence 3
Toggle Case among custom case sequence 4
Toggle Case among custom case sequence 5

toggleCase.sequences.markdownDescription: The custom sequences of each case like ["lowerCase", "upperCase"], unmentioned ones will be put at the end of list.

toggleCase.customSequences1.markdownDescription: The custom sequences of each case like ["lowerCase", "upperCase"], unmentioned ones will be ignored, using for extension.customToggleCase1.

toggleCase.customSequences2.markdownDescription: The custom sequences of each case like ["lowerCase", "upperCase"], unmentioned ones will be ignored, using for extension.customToggleCase2.

toggleCase.customSequences3.markdownDescription: The custom sequences of each case like ["lowerCase", "upperCase"], unmentioned ones will be ignored, using for extension.customToggleCase3.

toggleCase.customSequences4.markdownDescription: The custom sequences of each case like ["lowerCase", "upperCase"], unmentioned ones will be ignored, using for extension.customToggleCase4.

toggleCase.customSequences5.markdownDescription: The custom sequences of each case like ["lowerCase", "upperCase"], unmentioned ones will be ignored, using for extension.customToggleCase5.

toggleCase.case.upperCase.markdownDescription: Check to keep `UPPERCASE` formatting in loop

toggleCase.case.lowerCase.markdownDescription: Check to keep `lowercase` formatting in loop

toggleCase.case.capitalCase.markdownDescription: Check to keep `Capital Case` formatting in loop

toggleCase.case.titleCase.markdownDescription: Check to keep `Titlecase` formatting in loop

toggleCase.case.camelCase.markdownDescription: Check to keep `camelCase` formatting in loop

toggleCase.case.constantCase.markdownDescription: Check to keep `CONSTANT_CASE` formatting in loop

toggleCase.case.dotCase.markdownDescription: Check to keep `dot.case` formatting in loop

toggleCase.case.headerCase.markdownDescription: Check to keep `Header-Case` formatting in loop

toggleCase.case.kebabCase.markdownDescription: Check to keep `kebab-case` formatting in loop

toggleCase.case.pascalCase.markdownDescription: Check to keep `PascalCase` formatting in loop

toggleCase.case.pathCase.markdownDescription: Check to keep `path/case` formatting in loop

toggleCase.case.sentenceCase.markdownDescription: Check to keep `Sentence case` formatting in loop

toggleCase.case.snakeCase.markdownDescription: Check to keep `snake_case` formatting in loop

toggleCase.notification.notifyOnChange.markdownDescription: Check to receive notification when changing case

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
